message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this product to you at a price of $950,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure both parties receive fair value while maximizing the return on my investment. I believe this price is reasonable given the product's quality and its importance to you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.
